data.title: AMA University and Colleges
data.meta_description: The first in IT education and full online education in the Philippines.
data.meta_site_name: AMA University and Colleges - The country's first in IT education
data.text:
Online Enrollment For College Ongoing!

Follow your dreams & #CreateYourFutureToday!

Accepting freshmen, transferees, ALS passers and foreign students.

AMA Senior High School

Study safely at home through online learning. Accepting DepEd voucher and ESC Grantees.

AMA Basic Education

Online learning for Preschool, Kindergarten, Grade School and Junior High School.

ABOUT AMA UNIVERSITY And colleges

AMA University is a member of the AMA Education System and the first in IT education and full online education in the Philippines.

Our Reputation

ISO 9001:2008 Certified for all programs; Recognized as Center of Development in Information Technology by CHED…

Vision and Mission

AMA will be the leader and dominant provider of relevant globally recognized information technology-based education and related services in the global market…

Inside the Campus

College buildings, gymnasium, audio visual room, super lab..

PROGRAMS OFFERED

Master's Degree

MBA, MSIT, MSCS, MACoEd

Doctorate Degree

Doctor in Business Administration, Doctor in Information Technology

Senior High School

Academic, TVL, Sports, Arts and Design

Visit AMA NEWS:

CHED Grants Autonomous Status to AMA University

Enroll now! Invest in your future, dream big and aim higher. Take your next step with AMA Senior High. We are now accepting new students and transferees in all levels.

Online Student Enrollment System and Payment System are now available

GREAT NEWS! You may now pay your Tuition and Other Fees Online. Convenient, Safe, Secure and More Ways to Pay in your area. Pay via credit card, online banking, 7-Eleven, Cebuana, SM Bills payment and many more.
